data.text: @castrokink Same, same but different. My Master has had 2 tatts and quite a lot of piercings put on me. Would have loved if He had done it personally, Sir!
@castrokink Thank You Christopher I whole heartedly Agree !
@MasterGingerNYC Blood bonds are done for many reasons. Commitment. Catharsis. Joy. Grief. Peace. Lust. Love. Sensual. Primal. Whatever the meaning, they are special and honored.
@castrokink I had a Blood Brother, God Rest his Soul, His Father the Chief Allowed Me into their Circle. While different circumstances, I Understand the Connection !
